snippet: Observers looking for clues about the fate of one of China's most famous mob-busting security officials are watching how the Chinese authorities have, or have not, censored social media posts on the subject.
abstract: Observers looking for clues about the fate of one of China's most famous mob-busting security officials are watching how the Chinese authorities have, or have not, censored social media posts on the subject.

headline.main: Searching for Political Clues in China's Social Media Censorship
